import React from 'react'; import Bar from './Bar'; import Html from '../assets/icons/html5.svg' import Css from '../assets/icons/css.svg' import JavaScript from '../assets/icons/javascript.svg' import BootStrap from '../assets/icons/bootstrap.svg' import MaterialUi from '../assets/icons/material.svg' import react from '../assets/icons/react.ico' import blogging from '../assets/icons/blogging.svg' import graphics from '../assets/icons/graphics.svg' import photoshop from '../assets/icons/photoshop.svg' import illustrator from '../assets/icons/illustrator.svg' import xd from '../assets/icons/xd.svg' import English from '../assets/icons/English.svg' const languages = [ { icon: Html, name: 'HTML', level: '95' }, { icon: Css, name: 'CSS', level: '90' }, { icon: JavaScript, name: 'JavaScript', level: '80' }, { icon: BootStrap, name: 'Bootstrap', level: '90' }, { icon: MaterialUi, name: 'Material UI', level: '85' }, { icon: react, name: 'React', level: '80' } ] const Nlanguages = [ { icon:English, name:English, level: '85' } ] const frameworks = [ { icon: blogging, name: 'Blogging', level: '90' }, { icon: graphics, name: 'Graphic Designing', level: '85' }, { icon: photoshop, name: 'Adobe Photoshop', level: '80' }, { icon: illustrator, name: 'Adobe Illustrator', level: '80' }, { icon: xd, name: 'Adobe XD', level: '80' } ] const Resume = () => { return (

Education

Bachelor of Science in Computer Science

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing

Experience

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet

Academy of Technology

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing

Languages & Frameworks
{ languages.map(Language => ) }
Extra Skills
{ frameworks.map(framework => ) }
Natural Language
{ Nlanguages.map(Nlanguage => ) }
); }; export default Resume;
